verses.text: Ach in Diosal, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Colinel t'a heb' scot t'ayin yuj yajk'olal.
Colinel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' sk'ulan chukal. Colinel t'a heb' mak'umcham anima.
Mamin Jehová, tzin smaclej heb' anima te ov yic tzin smak'ancham heb', palta manh yujoc in chukal, malaj tas ix wutej heb'.
Mamin, malaj in mul t'a heb'. Malaj tas chuk ix in k'ulej. Palta snanonek' sk'ol heb' yak'an chukal t'ayin. Mamin, il in koti, cotanh, tzul in a colani.
Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a smasanil, ko Diosal ach a onh israel onh tik, cotanh elanhchamel, tzak'anoch syaelal juntzanh nación. Mocab' ok' a k'ool t'a heb' smeltzajoch yak'an chukal t'ayin.
Ayic sq'uik'b'i sjawi heb', tz'el yav heb' icha nok' tz'i', slajwi chi' slaj ek' heb' t'a kal chonhab'.
Swoman sti' heb' tzek' heb', haxo lolonel te ya syal heb'. Malaj mach tzab'an calani, xchamlaj heb'.
Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, tzaton ach tzewaj yuj heb'. Tzach b'uchwaj t'a juntzanh nación chi'.
Ach in Diosal, a t'ayach ipan in colan in b'a, yujto a ach ay ach och wipumaloc yet' wenhuloc.
Ach in Diosal, xajan in uuj, a ach ol ul in a colo'. Ol a ch'ox t'ayin tas wal ol aj skan heb' wajk'ol chi' t'a yalanh uuj.
Ach Jehová ko Kolumal, tzicub'tanhej heb' yet' a poder. Emnaquilocab' tzutejcan heb', palta manh a mak'chamlaj heb' yic a syaelal heb' chi' manh ol b'atlaj satk'olal yuj heb' wetchonhab'.
Tz'och smul heb' yuj masanil tas syala'. Canocab' heb' t'a yalanh yuj yak'umtaquil, yuj yesalwumal yet' yuj scatab'wumal heb'.
Satel heb' yet' yowal a k'ool. ¿Tasto wal yuj pitzan heb'? Ach Dios Kajal a onh yinhtilonhcan winhaj Jacob, elokab' a pecal masanto b'aj slajwik'och yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Sjawi heb' t'ak'walil, tz'el yav heb' icha nok' tz'i', slaj ek' heb' t'a kal chonhab' say swael, tz'awaj heb' icha yok' nok' tz'i', yujto max yab'laj sk'ool swael heb'.
Ha in xo pax jun, ol ach in b'itej t'a q'uinhib'alil. Ol walel sniwanil elk'ochi yet' a wach'k'olal t'a b'ital, yujto ayachnhejoch wenhuloc. In Kolumal ach t'a stiempoal yaelal.
Ach in Diosal, ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a b'ital. In Kolumal ach, in Diosal ach, xajanab'il in uuj.
